txt.en:
Bounty: Bel Inzûl Proto-beast

A proto-beast, lord of the jungle, stalks the stones in the north-western areas of Bel Inzûl.

Slaughter the menace and return to Bel Inzûl's healer for reward.

Do not go alone.
Speak with the healer at the outpost on Bel Inzûl
You defeated the menace in the north-western stones. Return to the healer at the outpost on Bel Inzûl to claim your reward.
You accepted a bounty for defeating the proto-beast dwelling in the north-western stones of Bel Inzûl.
'With the menace of the stones gone, it will be easier to harvest the cast of crabs there.\n\n'We thank you, friend. Killing the creature makes our efforts on the island much safer.'
You defeated the Bel Inzûl proto-beast
Gather a fellowship and make your way to the north-western stones of Bel Inzûl. Defeat the Bel Inzûl proto-beast.
